description.value: This substantial rune makes you difficult to hold back. Whenever you are affected by an effect that lasts until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Escape] (for instance, from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grapple] action or a tanglefoot bag), you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Quickened]. You can use the extra action each round only to Step or Escape.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
